title: Team Builder.  We need it back.
body:
Simply put, we have two options if we want to do a normal game of PVP:  

1. Sit in Draft Mode all day while people look up stats and summoner information to ban their best champions or whomever is the most OP at the time, and then after a 15 minute queue and a 5 minute pick/ban phase, somebody dodges and it repeats over and over.  Last night I had three games in Draft and spent at least 35 minutes waiting to play the games, not including the actual pick/ban phase and loading screen.  I got my primary one out of three times.

2. Go blind pick and hope you can type your lane quicker than the other people.  Even then, it doesn't mean someone won't go into that lane anyway.

I've never seen the logic behind removing Team Builder as it cured the toxicity of solo queue substantially, it granted you 100% chance of role and champion and it allowed you to kick out anybody who seemed trollish (aka, zilean jungle or skarner adc!) and the new champ select is actually far worse than Team Builder.  It is as if you guys went out of your way to make a product worse than three years ago, and I'm unsure why this was considered a good idea.

Instead of another disastrous solo queue, can we just have our team builder mode back for blind picks?  Choose champ, choose role, choose mastery/runes and skin and off we go.  Whatever you had planned for solo queue, Team Builder will be better anyway if Champ Select and Dynamic Queue are any indicators.

BRING BACK TEAM BUILDER!  We really would appreciate having a legitimate blind pick option. {{champion:64}}

What I miss most about Teambuilder is just playing the champs I want to play without having to deal with all the BS. If I want to play Garen,I could play Garen. I don't have to worry about him getting banned or picked away from me. I don't have to worry about fighting with others for the role I intend to play him in (blind pick/old draft) or deal with the chance of not getting that role (new champ select). This is a smaller nitpick, but I didn't have to worry about counterpicking or being counterpicked. That's why I liked Teambuilder & Dominion,I could pick any champs I wanted. If I just wanted to play Nami a bunch of games,I could.

I play this game for the champs, not for positions like Top or Support.

Makes me wish there was a game mode that let us pick them champs, but randomize the position we play them in.

Sorry but this is completely inaccurate.

Team Builder would have a game, in general, for me launched within five minutes max and I picked who joined, who stayed, and who got the boot.  I also had my champ guaranteed and my role guaranteed.  With this new crap, I can't even guarantee I want to play whatever game awaits me.

- Patience is a virtue, because anybody in there queuing as a support was usually a support main or good at it, not somebody "punished' to support because their main role was taken and they are more than happy to take it out in the game on you.  In other words, supports in T.B WANT to support.  

- Bans are fine for ranked and tryhards but I like fighting anybody and everybody.  How else are you going to learn how to improve? 

- Luck dependant, sure, I'll give you that.  I just had a game where I was Janna top vs Sion.  Nobody gave me a chance in hell at it.  However, I know my champ and I know a lot about mechanics.  The game ended with me 5/0 winning lane and game and kicking his rear end... why?  I knew his abilities, my abilities, his ranges, my ranges.   It wasn't even a troll game as much as I wanted to test my limits with certain champions... Champ Select is really the death of all that.

The best part is, you need no dodge punishments because in Team Builder people could leave if they did not like the team and you'd wait maybe 10 seconds for a new person?  In dyna queue its 15 minutes down the drain at least because you need to re-queue, re-ban, re-pick, and hope to hell nobody dodges.  

Coke used to push New Coke with the idea you have about DynaQ.  It failed, miserably, and Coca Cola had the sense to actually admit failure, pull it, and give the people what they wanted.

Team Builder needs to be resurrected and if anything, champ select needs to rest in peace.

The only bad thing about it is that it replaces soloQ. It's simply not fit for a competetive queue as it's obviously made for playing with your friends.

i.e. dynamicQ+game time = 30-45 mins, TB queue time ~20 mins
YES, Yes. All of my yes. In my face. Please.

Team Builder should replace Blind Pick if it comes back.

Adding Team Builder would increase queue times for all three modes by splitting up the playerbase between all three queues. If you weren't happy waiting for a 15 minute queue with a 5 minute ban phase then you'd certainly not be happy waiting 20 minutes to queue into a team and wait another 10 minutes waiting for a support to finish the team. Unless you really wanted to play support of course, which people obviously aren't happy about in the new Champion Select either.

Personally, I used Team Builder to guarantee my role and to play off-meta champions without having to worry about having to call my role. New Champion Select   does both better. Just this past Sunday I got to play 3 games on jungle Morgana in the span of around 3 hours including champ select. In Team Builder I MIGHT get to play one game in that time frame. In particular I remember queueing up for jungle Lux after Runeglaive was released and had to wait close to 20-30 minutes to find a game, and I wasn't about to try and queue up for another game.

I miss Team Builder so much. I don't play League anymore because its gone. Every time I want to play I just think of getting stuck in my secondary for 5 games (support) and going through an annoying pick-ban phase or having to fight for my role in standard blind.

I love to play League casually, but I don't have the time or energy to try to get my favorite role with my favorite champs unsuccessfully three games straight for three hours. It just isn't fun. I'd rather wait 20-30 minutes with my role locked in.

" hope you can type your lane quicker than the other people"

Just copy-paste, I do. It's kind of cheating. But other than that, yeah, I agree with you completely. I miss Team Builder, but I'm enjoying dynamic more than I expected to. Something that people completely overlook is that Team Builder has the exact same problem that Dynamic Queue has; there were a ton of 3 and 4 man teams.

The issue with teambuilder is that it doesn't work in a draft format really.  I personally think the solution would have been you pick your role, two or three champions you want to play, same team builder team set up, and you can see peoples pick intent. Find people you like, then find a match, pick ban happens, and based on bans, the you move down the persons pick intent tier.  Might be a little complicated, but it'd work.

At the very least, TB should be in normals again. Seems like the only reason they removed it was so that on release they could brag about the popularity of Dynamic Queue.

>I've never seen the logic behind removing Team Builder

Queue times. That's not the only reason, but it is a big enough reason that there don't need to be any other reasons.

Splitting the unranked playerbase between the new champ select (which is already having a hard enough time) and all its roles, draft pick, and the even MORE restrictive Team Builder would have been too much.

The new champ select is more similar to Team Builder than it is to draft pick, and the new champ select solves a lot of the problems that Team Builder itself solved. Not all of them, clearly, but that's how compromises work.

tl;dr--Not only would it would be somewhat redundant to have both TB and the NCS, but both would be crippled by queue times.
